trans-unit.source: A Windows Forms control that can be used to host a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) element.
trans-unit.target: È possibile usare un controllo Windows Form per ospitare un elemento Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control to place a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> on your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control or form.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controllo per inserire un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> sul [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controllo o del form.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> element.
trans-unit.target: Per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controllo un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> elemento.

trans-unit.source: WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: WindowsFormsIntegration viene installato con il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] assembly.

trans-unit.source: The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso predefinito per l'assembly è %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll.

trans-unit.source: To host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a Windows Form, you must assign the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento in un Windows Form, è necessario assegnare il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to assign custom mappings between an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control and its hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> proprietà a cui assegnare i mapping personalizzati tra un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controllo e il relativo hosting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Mapping di proprietà di Windows Form e WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controllo per ospitare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Hosting di un controllo composito WPF 3D in Windows Form](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per tutti i chiamanti nello stack di chiamate.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile usare questo membro in codice parzialmente attendibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il controllo viene automaticamente ridimensionato per visualizzare tutto il contenuto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control adjusts its size to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se la dimensione del controllo viene regolata in base al contenuto; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted element has a transparent background.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'elemento ospitato ha uno sfondo trasparente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosted element has a transparent background; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'elemento di hosting ha lo sfondo trasparente; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> property enables bitmap copying, which enables hosted elements to use transparency over the host container.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> proprietà consente la copia del bitmap, che consente agli elementi di utilizzare la trasparenza sul contenitore dell'host di hosting.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the element is over an image or gradient background.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile quando l'elemento è su un'immagine o uno sfondo sfumato.

trans-unit.source: For performance reasons, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> property is turned off by default.
trans-unit.target: Per motivi di prestazioni di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BackColorTransparent%2A> proprietà è disabilitata per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BindingContextChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.BindingContextChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> property can be set to an active value to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> può essere impostata su un valore attivo per abilitare il supporto IME.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child" /> element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> include un elemento <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child" />. In caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />, che è contenuto nel controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] di hosting.

trans-unit.source: Only one element can be hosted, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> can have any number of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Può essere ospitato un solo elemento, ma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> possono avere qualsiasi numero di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> property to assign a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Child%2A> proprietà a cui assegnare un ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a 3-D WPF Composite Control in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Hosting di un controllo composito WPF 3D in Windows Form](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-3-d-wpf-composite-control-in-windows-forms.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" /> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene impostata la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.Child" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si fa clic sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Click> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Click>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ClientSizeChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ClientSizeChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new control is added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si aggiunge un nuovo controllo all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlAdded> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlAdded>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAdded?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control is removed from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si rimuove un controllo dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlRemoved> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ControlRemoved>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlRemoved?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For a more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.CursorChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.CursorChanged> eventi, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CursorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni predefinite del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> predefinito del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DefaultSize%2A> property, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DefaultSize%2A> proprietà, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per rilasciare sia le risorse gestite sia quelle non gestite; <see langword="false" /> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Immediately frees any system resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Libera immediatamente qualsiasi risorsa di sistema utilizzata dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> references.
trans-unit.target: Se il parametro `disposing` è `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti a cui la classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> fa riferimento.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo richiama il metodo `Dispose` di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see langword="Dispose" /> può essere chiamato più volte da altri oggetti.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> prestare attenzione a non fare riferimento a oggetti che sono stati eliminati in una precedente chiamata a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come implementare <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, vedere [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si fa doppio clic sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DoubleClick> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DoubleClick>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene completata un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragDrop> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragDrop>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un oggetto viene trascinato nei limiti del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragEnter> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragEnter>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un oggetto viene trascinato fuori dai limiti del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragLeave> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragLeave>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un oggetto viene trascinato sui limiti del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragOver> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.DragOver>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window to be opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: La finestra [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] per essere aperta in maniera non modale.

trans-unit.source: Enables a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> to receive keyboard messages correctly when it is opened modelessly from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Consente all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Window" /> di ricevere correttamente messaggi dalla tastiera quando viene aperto in maniera non modale da [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> method to forward all keyboard messages when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window is opened modelessly.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> metodo per inoltrare tutti i messaggi di tastiera quando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] finestra viene aperta in maniera non modale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> method installs a message filter in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.EnableModelessKeyboardInterop%2A> metodo installa un filtro di messaggi nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-applicazione basata su.

trans-unit.source: The filter forwards all keyboard messages when the modeless window is active.
trans-unit.target: Il filtro inoltra tutti i messaggi della tastiera quando è attiva la finestra non modale.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for all callers higher in the call stack.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per tutti i chiamanti nello stack di chiamate.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile usare questo membro in codice parzialmente attendibile.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si entra nell'area del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Enter> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Enter>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il controllo ha lo stato attivo per l'input.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il controllo ha lo stato attivo; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.FontChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.FontChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ForeColorChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.ForeColorChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColorChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Area di dimensioni personalizzate per l'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base class implementation <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> to provide correct layout behavior for the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override dell'implementazione della classe di base di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)" /> per fornire il comportamento corretto del layout per gli elementi [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] di hosting.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> computed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control, given the constraints specified by <paramref name="proposedSize" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> calcolato dal controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> in base ai vincoli specificati da <paramref name="proposedSize" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GiveFeedback> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GiveFeedback>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo riceve lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent container of the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il contenitore padre dell'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] ospitato.

trans-unit.source: The parent container.
trans-unit.target: Contenitore padre.

trans-unit.source: The host container is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, which is the parent container for the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore host è il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, che è il contenitore padre per l'elemento ospitato.

trans-unit.source: The host container is always at the root of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore host è sempre nella radice di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] gerarchia di elementi.

trans-unit.source: To access the parent of the hosted element, access <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> directly.
trans-unit.target: Per accedere al padre dell'elemento di hosting, accedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> direttamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la modalità IME di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: Modalità IME del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario ridisegnare la visualizzazione di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Invalidated> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Invalidated>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The character to forward.
trans-unit.target: Carattere da inoltrare.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all WM_CHAR key messages are forwarded to the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Assicura che tutti i messaggi chiave WM_CHAR vengono inoltrati all'elemento ospitato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: If the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element does not process `charCode`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> control processes it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento non viene elaborato `charCode`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> controllo elabora con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si preme un tasto mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyDown> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyDown>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si preme un tasto mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyPress> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyPress>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si rilascia un tasto mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyUp> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.KeyUp>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario riposizionare i controlli figlio di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Layout> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Layout>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando lo stato attivo per l'input esce dall'area del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Leave> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Leave>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo perde lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.LostFocus> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.LostFocus>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses or gains mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo perde o riceve lo stato mouse capture.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseCaptureChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseCaptureChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si fa clic con il mouse sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseClick> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseClick>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si fa doppio clic con il mouse sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDoubleClick> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDoubleClick>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse si trova sul controllo mentre viene premuto un pulsante del mouse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDown> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseDown>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse entra nell'area del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseEnter> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseEnter>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse si sofferma sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseHover> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseHover>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse esce dall'area del controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseLeave> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseLeave>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is moved over the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse viene spostato sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseMove> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseMove>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse si trova sul controllo mentre viene rilasciato un pulsante del mouse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseUp> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseUp>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando si sposta la rotellina del mouse mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseWheel> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.MouseWheel>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Dati per l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EnabledChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnEnabledChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.GotFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnGotFocus%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnGotFocus%2A>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnGotFocus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnHandleCreated%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnHandleCreated%2A>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnLeave%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnLeave%2A>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLeave%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint%2A> method forwards to the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> implementazione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint%2A> metodo inoltra all'implementazione della classe base.

trans-unit.source: Do not override this implementation of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Non eseguire l'override di questa implementazione del <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control manages the painting of its hosted element, and overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> will cause unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> controllo gestisce il disegno dell'elemento ospitato e override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> causerà risultati imprevisti.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the control to paint.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> che contiene informazioni sul controllo da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Disegna lo sfondo del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaintBackground%2A> method paints the parent control's background into an offscreen HBITMAP.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnPaintBackground%2A> metodo disegna sfondo del controllo padre in una HBITMAP.

trans-unit.source: This bitmap is used as the background in the hosted element to support transparency.
trans-unit.target: Questa bitmap viene utilizzata come sfondo nell'elemento di hosting per supportare la trasparenza.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo supporta l'infrastruttura di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Renders the control using the provided <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rendering del controllo utilizzando l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> fornito.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property that has changed and requires translation.
trans-unit.target: Nome della proprietà cambiata che richiede la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo valore della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap" /> that a property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap" /> sulla modifica di una proprietà.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per gli eredi.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro non può essere ereditato da codice parzialmente attendibile.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnVisibleChanged%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.OnVisibleChanged%2A>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnVisibleChanged%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's padding changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando la spaziatura interna del controllo cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PaddingChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PaddingChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> viene ridisegnato.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this event adds event handlers to the base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> event.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di questo evento aggiunge gestori eventi per la base <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima dell'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown" /> quando viene premuto un tasto mentre il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PreviewKeyDown> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PreviewKeyDown>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passato per riferimento, che rappresenta il messaggio della finestra da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values representing the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> che rappresenta il tasto da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the command before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un tasto di comando, assicurando che l'elemento di hosting ha la possibilità di gestire il comando prima dell'elaborazione [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normale.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il carattere è un tasto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] di scelta rapida; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Se un messaggio chiave non viene gestito da ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, viene inoltrato lungo il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] gerarchia per l'elaborazione delle classi.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per il chiamante immediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile usare questo membro in codice parzialmente attendibile.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: Carattere da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character, ensuring that the hosted element has an opportunity to handle the mnemonic before normal [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] processing.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un carattere mnemonico, assicurando che l'elemento di hosting abbia la possibilità di gestire il mnemonico prima dell'elaborazione [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] normale.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character is a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] shortcut key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il carattere è un tasto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] di scelta rapida; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If a key message is not handled by the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, it is forwarded up the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] class hierarchy for processing.
trans-unit.target: Se un messaggio chiave non viene gestito da ospitato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento, viene inoltrato lungo il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] gerarchia per l'elaborazione delle classi.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per il chiamante immediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile usare questo membro in codice parzialmente attendibile.

trans-unit.source: Gets the property map, which determines how setting properties on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> control affects the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la mappa della proprietà che determina come l'impostazione di proprietà sul controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> può influire sull'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] di hosting.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> that maps <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> to properties on the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.PropertyMap" /> che esegue il mapping di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost" /> sulle proprietà dell'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ospitato.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies have two similar but different property models.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologie hanno due proprietà simili ma diversi modelli.

trans-unit.source: *Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures.
trans-unit.target: *Mapping di proprietà* supporta l'interazione tra le due architetture.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni, vedere [Mapping di proprietà di Windows Form e WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> property to translate the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> property for a hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.PropertyMap%2A> proprietà da convertire il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> proprietà per l'hosting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Mapping Properties Using the ElementHost Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura dettagliata: Mapping delle proprietà tramite il controllo ElementHost](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-mapping-properties-using-the-elementhost-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento della selezione e consente all'origine del trascinamento di determinare se l'operazione deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.QueryContinueDrag> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.QueryContinueDrag>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Resize> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Resize>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Resize?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.RightToLeftChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.RightToLeftChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Fattore di ridimensionamento per l'asse x.

trans-unit.source: The scaling factor for the y-axis.
trans-unit.target: Fattore di ridimensionamento per l'asse y.

trans-unit.source: Scales the parent container and the hosted [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control.
trans-unit.target: Ridimensiona il contenitore padre e il controllo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] di hosting.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per specificare la direzione del controllo da selezionare; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per spostarsi in avanti nell'ordine di tabulazione, <see langword="false" /> per spostarsi all'indietro.

trans-unit.source: Activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Attiva l'elemento di hosting.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method activates the hosted element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> metodo attiva all'elemento ospitato.

trans-unit.source: If more than one hosted element exists, either the first or last element is activated, depending on the `directed` and `forward` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Se esiste più di un elemento di hosting, viene attivato o il primo o ultimo elemento, a seconda di `directed` e `forward` parametri.

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> method do not traverse the hosted elements.
trans-unit.target: Le chiamate ripetute al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.Select%2A> metodo non scorrono gli elementi di hosting.

trans-unit.source: To select subsequent elements, call the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per selezionare gli elementi successivi, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MoveFocus%2A> metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.HostContainer%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This implementation forwards tab keys from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione inoltra i tasti di tabulazione da [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.SizeChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.SizeChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore della proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text" /> cambia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.TextChanged> event, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per altre informazioni sull'evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.TextChanged>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A message to process.
trans-unit.target: Messaggio da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Elabora i messaggi di Windows.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.WndProc%2A> method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost.WndProc%2A>, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per il chiamante immediato.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile usare questo membro in codice parzialmente attendibile.

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: per l'attendibilità totale per gli eredi.

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro non può essere ereditato da codice parzialmente attendibile.
